transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan ji, Sahil sir baat kare?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Sahil sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Sir aapka jo ye request hai, wo I think discussion meri team ne to acche se kar hi liya hai. Main fir bhi aapko ek clarify aap aap refund ke liye I think discussion kar rahe hain. Right sir?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Haan, to case ke bare mein mujhe sara pata hai. Main aapse kuch bhi repeat nahi kar paungi. That's the first assurance. Sir secondly, I think aapko ye ye bhi communicate clearly kiya gaya hai ki refund to hamare yahan koi policy hi nahi hai. Haan, but jahan par koi legal issue aa jata hai in the sense ki hum kisi particular product ka business opportunities nahi de pate hain. Aur hamare yahan hi uski viability nahi hoti hai. Bas us case mein hum definitely because ROI nahi hai to hum karte hain. Wo bhi matlab exceptional cases hote hain. To besides that refund policy nahi hai hamare yahan. I think ye bhi aapko clearly communicate ho gaya hai sir.

Customer: Ye to mam aap aaj bol rahe ho na. Chalo chhodo aage bataiye.

Executive: Bas to yahi aapko communicate karna tha ki refund ki koi bhi policy hamare yahan nahi hoti. Kyunki hum business opportunities provide karte hain, wo aapko sufficiently aa rahi hai. Aap kya naam hai?

Customer: Mera naam Satya hai. Satya Gulati.

Executive: Satya, aap email dekh rahe ho? Ek email koi aur handle kar raha hai?

Executive: Sir, maine sara kuch dekh liya hai sir. Main pura sab kuch dekha hai.

Customer: To email pe aapne mere se account detail kyun mangai thi?

Executive: Nahi, wo thik hai account detail mangwai. But usme ek aur point ye bhi to hai na ki refund agar karna bhi pad jata hai, to refund jo hota hai sir wo pro rata base pe hota hai. Matlab aaj tak ki jo service jitne duration ki aapne use kar li hai, wo consume ho gaya. Wo humne aapko service delivery de di. Ab jo unused pada hai aage ke duration ka.

Customer: Mera na aapne aise hi yahi sab baatein kar karke bahut jyada time kharab kar diya. Dimag to alag se aap kharab kar hi rahe ho. Ek banda pareshan hai. Pehle hi aap usko chutiya to de chuke ho. Upar se ye sab kahaniyan dal dal ke na aur disturb karte ho. To main abhi sirf consumer court mein aur main consumer court mein na lagaunga ki jaise aap simple si baat hai na.

Executive: Sir, simple si baat hai sir aap aapko bhi logical baat karni chahiye na. Aap ek to hamare yahan koi refund policy nahi hai aap fir refund ke liye kyun nahi hai main plan hi nahi dekha tha aapke executive ne mera dimag kharab kiya hua hai. Aapka jo hai monthly basis pe chal raha hai isliye aapko kam nahi mil raha. Aap ye upgrade karwao to aapko kam milega. Upgrade karwane ke baad usse bhi bekar haal raha to main refund kyun na mangu. Us time bhi maine unko yahi bola tha ki mujhe service nahi achi lagi to mujhe refund hi chahiye. Clear maine mention kiya hua hai.

Executive: Aapne kahin par aapko us time bolna chahiye tha ki aap is bari lene se pehle soch lo hum refund nahi karte.

Customer: Sir ye to har jagah aise hi chalta hai na. Ye thodi na hota hai ki hum teen mahine aap agar aap agar aise karke fraud karoge to main to mar ke kya fir main social media pe dal raha hu ki aap kaise kaise fraud kar rahe ho. Galat guide karte ho plan chipka rahe ho apne taraf.

Executive: Koi services nahi hai koi sunwai nahi hai koi kam hi nahi milta. Kyun band kar raha hu main aise thodi na band kar raha hu.

Executive: Sunna bhi padega. Sir aap suniye ek bar. Main ye bol rahi hu aapke alawa na 50 bande mujhe call karte hain sabke mujhe pata hai ye baat mujhe pata hai sir. I am aware about it. Main sirf ye lastly aapko bata rahi hu ki product jo hai agar aapke liye refund approval hota hai aur ho raha ho sir wo pro rata base pe hoga. Sirf itni si communication main aapko dena chahti hu. That's about it.

Customer: Jitne time ka aapne use kar liya mujhe full refund nahi kar rahe ho koi dikkat nahi hai. Main abhi fir complaint hi dal raha hu. Koi dikkat nahi hai.

Executive: Thik hai. Aap mujhe pareshan to kar hi rahe ho thoda sa aur pareshan ho jaunga.

Executive: Thik hai sir dekhiye main to aapko policy bata rahi hu. Main mera utna bas purpose banta hai. Main bas utna aapko uske bare mein bata rahi hu. Thik hai sir. Thik hai sir.

Customer: Okay sir. Ho gaya to call disconnect kar dijiye.

Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is requesting a refund.

- Customer states executive misguided him about plan.



Resolution:

- Executive stated company has no refund policy.

- Executive explained refund is pro-rata basis.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will file a complaint.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, policy, pro rata, complaint
